apy_ada_tooltip:
The Net supplier APY (interest + ADA staking rewards) is {{apy}}.
The interest earned on supplied ADA in Liqwid is {{supplyApy}}%.
ADA market utilization is {{utilization}}%.
The ADA staking reward is {{adaStakingApy}}% (calculated based on the average of the last 10 epochs).
The formula used to calculate this is: Net ADA Supplier APY = (Total deposited ADA x Supplier APY) + (Total deposited ADA (1-Utilization Rate) x Staking APY)
lq_apy_display:
Link to APR calculations
This APR indicates the return from LQ market participation rewards. It is a calculation based on the updated dynamic emissions formulae (3-day epoch). The displayed APRs are purely for informing users. The displayed APRs are not financial, investment, tax, legal, or technical advice. Any use of decentralized finance protocols involves various financial risks. Nothing displayed in this app is financial advice and it is your responsibility to complete due diligence (do your own research).

nav.notification: Please make sure you're visiting app.liqwid.finance - bookmark it to be safe.

graph.defillama_tooltip: TVL data fetched from DeFi Llama. Any inaccuracies in the source data will also be present on this graph.
